presetRemixes.title: The Breakfast Pizza
steps: Get a fresh slice of cheese pizza from the pizza station
Top with scrambled eggs from the grill station
Add crispy bacon bits
Drizzle with ranch and hot sauce
Fold in half like a taco if you're brave
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: The warm pizza crust acts as the perfect base for breakfast toppings. The combination of cheese, eggs, and bacon hits all the breakfast food groups, while hot sauce and ranch add the perfect kick.

presetRemixes.title: Asian Fusion Bowl
ingredients: Base of fried rice from Asian station
steps: Start with a base of fried rice in your bowl
Add a layer of fresh mixed greens
Top with teriyaki chicken from Asian station
Add edamame and cucumber from salad bar
Drizzle with extra soy sauce and sriracha
Mix everything together
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Combines the warmth of fried rice with the crunch of fresh vegetables. The hot and cold contrast makes every bite interesting, and you're getting protein, carbs, and veggies in one bowl.

presetRemixes.title: Dessert Pasta
steps: Get plain buttered pasta (no marinara!)
While still warm, mix in chocolate chips until melted
Drizzle with honey
Top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream
Sprinkle crushed graham crackers on top
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Warm pasta melts the chocolate chips perfectly. The butter makes it rich, honey adds sweetness, and ice cream cools it down. It's basically a deconstructed s'mores pasta.

presetRemixes.title: Loaded Fry Burger Bowl
steps: Fill bowl with crispy fries
Chop up a burger patty into bite-size pieces
Layer patty pieces over fries while hot
Add shredded cheese so it melts
Top with grilled onions and pickles
Drizzle BBQ sauce generously
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: It's a deconstructed burger with extra fries. The hot fries and burger melt the cheese perfectly. Every bite has burger, fries, and toppings - way better than eating them separately.

presetRemixes.title: The Grilled Cheese Burger
steps: Make two grilled cheese sandwiches
Use them as the 'buns' for your burger
Place burger patty between the grilled cheeses
Add lettuce, tomato, and mayo
Press down and cut in half
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Why choose between a burger and grilled cheese when you can have both? The crispy grilled cheese adds an extra cheese layer and crunch. It's excessive and amazing.

presetRemixes.title: Pizza Egg Roll Fusion
ingredients: Lo mein noodles from Ginger + Soy
steps: Get lo mein and veggies from Ginger + Soy
Place noodles and veggies on pizza slice
Sprinkle extra parmesan
Fold pizza slice over like a taco
Use second slice to make another
Dip in soy sauce
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: East meets West in the best way. The pizza crust holds Asian noodles perfectly. It's like a fusion egg roll with Italian bread. Weird? Yes. Delicious? Also yes.

presetRemixes.title: Breakfast Skillet Sandwich
steps: Get two pancakes from The Skillet
Add sausage patty and scrambled eggs between them
Drizzle with maple syrup
Add a few drops of hot sauce for kick
Eat like a sandwich
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: The McGriddle at home! Sweet and savory breakfast in portable form. The syrup soaks into the pancakes while the hot sauce balances the sweetness. Perfect for eating on the go.

presetRemixes.title: The Coffee Shop Shake
ingredients: Shot of espresso from coffee bar
steps: Get a vanilla shake from McDonald's
Add a shot of espresso for coffee flavor
Drizzle chocolate syrup
Top with whipped cream
Sprinkle chocolate chips
Stir with straw
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: It's an affogato meets milkshake. The espresso adds sophistication to the shake. Perfect afternoon pick-me-up with dessert vibes but coffee energy.

presetRemixes.title: The Ultimate Avocado Toast
steps: Toast thick sourdough bread
Mash avocado with fork and spread generously
Top with halved cherry tomatoes
Sprinkle everything bagel seasoning
Add microgreens for crunch
Drizzle with balsamic glaze
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Café-quality avocado toast for dining hall prices. The everything seasoning adds the perfect savory crunch, while balsamic gives it a gourmet touch. Instagram-worthy and filling.

presetRemixes.title: Grilled Cheese Tomato Soup Dippers
steps: Make grilled cheese with extra cheese
Cut into strips for dipping
Get a large cup of tomato soup
Add fresh basil to soup
Season with black pepper
Dip and enjoy the ultimate comfort combo
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Classic combo but optimized. Cutting the grilled cheese into strips maximizes dipping surface area. The fresh basil elevates the canned soup. Pure comfort food perfection.

presetRemixes.title: Bakery Parfait
steps: Tear croissant into bite-sized pieces
Layer yogurt in a bowl
Add croissant pieces
Top with fresh berries and granola
Drizzle honey generously
Sprinkle crushed almonds
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: Buttery croissant pieces soak up the yogurt like French toast. It's fancier than regular parfait and more interesting. The texture contrast between soft croissant and crunchy granola is perfect.

presetRemixes.title: The Mediterranean Flatbread
steps: Get a plain flatbread or cheese-less pizza base
Spread hummus as the base instead of sauce
Top with cucumber slices and halved cherry tomatoes
Crumble feta cheese on top
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic
Add fresh herbs if available
presetRemixes.whyItWorks: A healthier pizza alternative with Mediterranean flavors. The hummus adds protein and creaminess. It's refreshing, filling, and feels lighter than regular pizza while still being satisfying.

remixTemplates.description: Combine two stations in a sandwich
